Articles.Content:
Similar to this:

"Mk1 crew cabin Nullreference exceptions, found by ObsessedWithKSP and dallabop on reddit." in the 1.0.5 issues repository thread, but it appears to affect *any* pod. I tried the Mk1 capsule, cupola, lander can, etc. With a single Kerbal in one pod, transferring to any other using the crew hatch click method, the IVA portrait disappears, and the game hangs up if I press 'C' to go to IVA. There's an NRE in the log:


[EXC 22:30:43.643] NullReferenceException
	UnityEngine.Transform.set_localPosition (Vector3 value)
	CameraManager.SetCameraIVA (.Kerbal kerbal, Boolean resetCamera)
	CameraManager.SetCameraIVA ()
	CameraManager.NextCameraMode ()
	CameraManager.Update ()
Okay, thanks MOARdV, I'll pass this on to NathanKell
